original_title: WHAT IF? A (Fan-Made) 'Life is Strange' Story
overview: Maxine Caulfield is a high school senior, studying photography at Blackwell Academy, a prestigious private high school. Max's life is about to change, however, when she discovers that she has the incredible ability to "rewind" time. Now she and her childhood best friend, Chloe Price, must embark on a harrowing adventure to find a missing girl, and prevent a looming and terrible fate for the town of Arcadia Bay.
title: WHAT IF? A (Fan-Made) 'Life is Strange' Story
